00029 
00031 // CPU-MODEL-TO-CONTEXT CALLBACKS
00033 
00034 //
00035 // Utility functions for 1, 2, 4 and 8 byte code fetches from the passed address
00036 // The result is read using the current processor endianness
00037 //
00038 Uns8  vmicxtFetch1Byte(vmiProcessorP processor, Addr simAddress);
00039 Uns16 vmicxtFetch2Byte(vmiProcessorP processor, Addr simAddress);
00040 Uns32 vmicxtFetch4Byte(vmiProcessorP processor, Addr simAddress);
00041 Uns64 vmicxtFetch8Byte(vmiProcessorP processor, Addr simAddress);
00042 
00043 #endif
